name: The Matrix Online
description:
The Matrix Online is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Monolith Productions. It came out on 22-03-2005. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
The Matrix Online is available on PC.
It was produced by Joel Silver and Troy Skinner. It was directed by The Wachowskis. It was scored by Nathan Grigg.
